DOC.brief_summary: This study will investigate the hypothesis that the analgesic effect of a single injection of Dysport (200 MU) induces a significant reduction of symptoms in chronic cases of plantar fasciitis.
DOC.brief_title: Study to Assess the Efficacy and Safety of DysportÂ® in the Treatment of Chronic Plantar Fasciitis
DOC.criteria: Chronic plantar fasciitis (duration of disorder at least 4 months) At least 4 points on the visual analogue scale (010) for the most severe pain within the last 48 hours At least 2 previous unsuccessful conservative therapies Age 18 and older Rheumatoid diseases (M. Bechterew, chronic polyarthritis, psoriasisarthritis, para /postinfectious arthritis etc.) Previous surgery in the affected area of the foot Pretreatment with Botulinum toxin A (only de novo patients) Prohibited concomitant treatment: local injections during the study and 2 weeks prior to start of study
